channel.title: [PI] Command that gives you items[PI]
channel.description:
how do you make a command that gives you multiple items for admin +.
ex. ::runes gives you 1k of every rune? REP ++ reward

item.title: [PI] Command that gives you items[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Acrodox Acrodox
item.description:
@Acrodox wrote:

[quote=“Runefell, post:20, topic:363779”][quote author=Acrodox link=topic=460022.msg3366572#msg3366572 date=1286838008]

I would appreciate it if you edited your post calling me a “fucking idiot”. If not I’ll have to talk to a moderator and get a warning put on your account. I don’t think you would like that.

runefell, you cant tell a moderator on me for calling you a fucking idiot, nice “threatening” PM… just dont fuck with me. Telling on me for that is like a 9th grader telling the principal someone called them stupid. Seriously, fuck off

P.S. gonna tell on me for writing that too?

Don’t fuck with you? LMFAO you act like you can do something about it.

heard of hacking or Ddos? I dotn waste my time on scrubs…
[/quote]
Keep this topic going and you’ll regret it.[/quote]

you scare me! Illl go hide behind and proxy and lock my doors. uh oh

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Command that gives you items[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Acrodox Acrodox
item.description:
@Acrodox wrote:

[quote=“EmulousGuru, post:18, topic:363779”][quote author=xxxtilllyxxx link=topic=460022.msg3366574#msg3366574 date=1286838147]
You sir, are wrong. The command shoud not have && c.playerRights >= 2) { Because pi has seperate divisions for player rights >1… Code shud look like

if(playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“runes”)
c.getItems().addItem(ITEM_ID, ITEM_AMOUNT);
c.getItems().addItem(ITEM_ID, ITEM_AMOUNT);
c.getItems().addItem(ITEM_ID, ITEM_AMOUNT);
c.getItems().addItem(ITEM_ID, ITEM_AMOUNT);
}

[/quote]
Not all Emulous servers sort them by playerRights.

Also, it would work either way.[/quote]

yiur both half right.

Read full topic

c.getItems().addItem(ITEM_ID, ITEM_AMOUNT);
c.getItems().addItem(ITEM_ID, ITEM_AMOUNT);

}

 [/quote]
